message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for $12,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  $12,000 is a great starting point, but I'm looking to get a bit closer to my budget.  Would you be willing to come down to $10,500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to get closer to your budget, but I've already gone lower than my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,250. What do you think?
